Encyclopedia Fun!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Encyclopedia Fun!
By ShadowFusion on Monday, April 29, 2002 - 09:21 am:

I didn't find this until today, but while i was at the shrine, i went to my encyclopedia and was looking at the Hengars i have to figure out which one to raised for the Hengar challenge, anyway, i pressed the Square button and i found out i can play around with the monster, even distort is using the joystick things. It is quite possible i am the only one who didn't know about this aspect of the game until now, but incase any one else didn't know, i thought i'ld spread the word. It is pretty cool, i don't know if this is accessable in the encyclopedia at the title screen. Check it out!

By Monster Fenrick on Monday, April 29, 2002 - 09:28 am:

Neato!
i'll be sure to check that out. I always wondered why we couldn't manipulate the monsters as we could in MR and MR2.

Can you Zoom in, Rotate, or have them perform one of their animations?

By ShadowFusion on Monday, April 29, 2002 - 09:37 am:

There are five animations, one for R1, R2, Square, O, and X. L1 Zooms in, L2 zooms out.

Pressing the right keypad rotates right, and pressing the left keypad rotates left. pressing the up keypad moves the monster up, and the down keypad moves the monster down.

Moving the left control stick right distorts the monster
by making it thinner and moving it left distorts the monster by making this thicker.

The right control stick is just the opposite, right = thicker, left = thinner.
Have fun!

By Lisa Shock on Monday, April 29, 2002 - 10:26 am:

It's not really news, although the complete guide is nice. People have been posting about it since the first day the game was out in the US, and, of course, I mentioned it in my coverage of the Japanese game.

By ShadowFusion on Monday, April 29, 2002 - 10:40 am:

sorry Lisa, i didn't realize it was old news. Well, at least anyone who didn't know, now will.
